items.ja: 'The players cannot fight alone' - Pereira on fan reaction to Burnley loss

items.text_for_match: 'The players cannot fight alone' - Pereira on fan reaction to Burnley loss Wolves manager Vitor Pereira says it is "normal" for fans to feel frustrated after losing 3-2 to a last-minute goal against Burnley, but says the team need them on their side as "the players cannot fight alone". Wolves manager Vitor Pereira says it is "normal" for fans to feel frustrated after losing 3-2 to a last-minute goal against Burnley, but says the team need them on their side as "the players cannot fight alone".
